My Work

Spotlight Project #1: PAL Provider Portal GitHub

A full-service online portal for podiatrists to check on the status of orders, create new orders, and reorder previous prescriptions. Over 150 podiatrists/staff members used the platform at time of departure. Microsoft SQL, Sequelize, Node.js, HTML, CSS, Javascript.



Spotlight Project #2: Reditus SARS-CoV-2 PCR Machine Interface and Map Generator GitHub

Interface software for QuantStudio Flex polymerase chain reaction machine (ThermoFisher). This code took patient information from the laboratory's patient software and applied well map data to assign each patient to a proper well and light spectrum for error-free patient lab data tracking. Tracked hundreds of thousands of patients at time of departure. Node.js, HTML, CSS, Javascript.

Check out my other projects!
